widget.header: Take a Look at the Ongoing Development of Our Consumer Portal

config: Case Outlines for Law Students: We completed several more outlines on law school electives (post-first year courses), including Business Organizations, Administrative Law, Employment Law, Intellectual Property, and Federal Courts.
Snippets for Additional Centers: We continued making our Legal Guides more accessible and readable by adding snippets to the Traffic Tickets and Employment Law centers.
Videos: We took the first step in a long-term project to create informational videos for consumers by outlining and filming a demo video on child custody.

Promoting Legal Guides: We continued with the series of Onward blog posts highlighting our Justia Legal Guides centers and exemplifying how consumers might use them, such as the new Truck Accidents center blog post.
